channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2171|2024-08-04T07:01:40.667Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.2 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2170|2024-08-04T07:01:40.875Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.2 and earlier does not escape package names in the table of packages obtained from a remote server, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability.
